settings.title: The Future Of Chocolate Is Here
settings.content: Our mission is simple: Create freakishly delicious chocolate that's actually good for you
The Most Nutrient-Dense Sweetener In The World:

settings.text: The Most Nutrient Dense Sweetener In The World

settings.content:
_______
  • Rich Source Of Fiber
  • Low Glycemic
  • Improve Digestion
  • Lower Blood Pressure
  • Reduce Inflammation
  • Rich In Vitamins & Minerals

settings.title: Bye-Bye Sugar Spikes
settings.content: Unlike refined sugar spikes that lead to crashes, dates have a low glycemic index thanks to their high fiber content - meaning they release sugar slowly, keeping blood sugar steady.

settings.title: Nutrient Powerhouse
settings.content: Dates are packed with essential nutrients that support overall health. Dates have more potassium than bananas, and more antioxidants than blueberries.

settings.title: The Perfect Pair
settings.content: With a rich, caramel-like sweetness, dates enhance the bold, fudgy notes of our Ugandan cacao, creating a creamy, indulgent taste. It’s a natural pairing that delivers on everything you love about chocolate, with none of the guilt.

settings.title: Rich Source Of Fiber
settings.content:
• Dates are a rich source of fiber, providing around 7 grams per 100 grams.
  • Fiber aids in digestion by promoting regular bowel movements and preventing constipation.
  • Fiber also helps control blood sugar levels, supports weight management by promoting satiety, and reduces the risk of heart disease by lowering cholesterol levels.
  • Additionally, fiber nourishes beneficial gut bacteria, contributing to a healthy gut microbiome.

settings.title: Improve Digestion
settings.content:
• Dates have a positive impact on digestion due to their fiber content.
  • The fiber in dates adds bulk to the stool, aiding in regular bowel movements and preventing constipation. This helps maintain a healthy digestive system.
  • Additionally, the fiber in dates promotes a feeling of fullness, reducing overeating and supporting weight management.

settings.title: Lower Blood Pressure
settings.content:
• While they are not a direct treatment for high blood pressure, dates are rich in potassium, a mineral known to help regulate blood pressure levels.
  • Potassium helps counterbalance the effects of sodium, which can contribute to hypertension.
  • Additionally, the fiber content in dates supports cardiovascular health, which is essential for maintaining healthy blood pressure.

settings.title: Reduce Inflammation
settings.content:
• They contain various compounds, such as flavonoids and carotenoids, which possess anti-inflammatory properties.
  • These compounds help to counteract the effects of inflammation and oxidative stress in the body.
  • Additionally, dates are a good source of fiber, which has been associated with reduced inflammation.

settings.title: Rich in Vitamins & Minerals
settings.content:
• They are particularly rich in potassium, which supports heart health and helps maintain proper blood pressure.
  • Dates also contain magnesium, which is essential for bone health and muscle function.
  • They offer vitamins like vitamin B6, which is important for metabolism and brain function, and vitamin K, crucial for blood clotting and bone health.
  • Dates also contain smaller amounts of vitamins A, C, and folate.

settings.title: WHY DATES?
settings.content: A rich superfood that shines beyond its heavenly flavors

settings.title: Antioxidant Powerhouse, Nature’s Shield
settings.content: Think of cacao as your body’s personal bouncer, kicking out free radicals before they can crash the health party. Packed with antioxidants, cacao’s powerful flavonoids go to work defending your cells against premature aging and disease.

settings.title: Natural Mood Booster
settings.content: When life needs a little brightness, cacao steps in as the ultimate feel-good agent. It’s rich in compounds that encourage serotonin, dopamine, and endorphins—turning every bite into a mini happiness boost. Forget sugar highs and crashes; with cacao, you’re getting a natural lift that’s as steady as it is delicious.

settings.title: Nutritional Powerhouse
settings.content: Cacao may come in a humble bean, but it’s packed with essentials like magnesium, iron, and fiber. This is no empty treat; it’s full-on nourishment, giving you minerals that are essential for muscles, mood, and energy. In short, cacao is as nourishing as it is flavorful.

settings.title: Naturally Energizing
settings.content: Need energy but tired of the caffeine spikes? Cacao has theobromine, a gentle stimulant that offers sustained energy without the jitters. It’s a natural lift that keeps you focused and ready for anything, making cacao a perfect pick-me-up any time of the day.

settings.title: Heart Health Hero
settings.content: With a heart as golden as its flavor, cacao supports cardiovascular health with a special dose of love. High in flavonoids, it helps improve blood flow and reduces blood pressure, giving your heart the boost it deserves. It's like a little cardio session you can savor.

settings.subheading: Cacao is one of the richest sources of antioxidants, protecting your body from harmful free radicals.
settings.title: Packed with Antioxidants

settings.author: Liana Werner-Gray | Certified Nutritionist & Best-Selling Author 'Cancer-Free with Food'
settings.content: “The first thing I did when I saw The Conscious Bar chocolate was to look at the ingredients and I must say, wow!  A premium chocolate bar, vegan & gently sweetened with organic dates! I was so excited to try it, and as soon as I tasted it I was amazed. The flavors are incredible, very uplifting and you can clearly taste the pure ingredients which are essentially two superfoods and nothing else.

settings.author: Andrés Preschel | Exercise Physiologist, Lifestyle Medicine Author and Podcast Host
settings.content: “I’m a big believer in transparency... how you do one thing is how you do everything. The Conscious Bar is no exception; it’s clearly an extremely healthy, truly sustainable and ethically sourced chocolate bar that you can feel REALLY good about all the way through. The chocolate is exquisite, but this brand sets the bar high for so much more than its mere indulgence. Thank you!"

settings.author: John Iatrellis | Corporate Executive Chef, Lifehouse Hotels
settings.content: "The Conscious Bar is truly innovating the craft chocolate space. As a Chef we try to speak the language of the foods from the lands in which our journey has allowed us to experience. These guys speak in the most fluent and natural epicurean language with delicious, clean & honest ingredients that fuel the soul and literally give back to mother nature through their commitment to sustainability."

settings.title: Direct Trade
settings.content: Working directly with farmers enables us to ensure the welfare and success of the entire value chain. This also allows us to provide & market our products responsibility so that our customers can enjoy the experience of indulging in our products while feeling at ease that our farmers are well taken care of.

settings.title: Sustainability
settings.content: Our packaging is plastic free, made entirely with post consumer waste products (PCW). Our interior film wrappers and exterior sealing stickers are also compostable & biodegradable, made out of eco-friendly materials such as eucalyptus wood pulp obtained from controlled plantations...

settings.title: Nourishment
settings.content: Chocolate can be more than a treat—it can be a powerhouse of nutrition. With Organic Cacao and Organic Dates as our main ingredients, The Conscious Bar offers indulgence that’s as nourishing as it is delicious – and we have the science to back it up. Let’s dive into the data, shall we?

settings.title: We don't cut corners.
settings.content: We set out to build a chocolate brand you can trust, all the way through. From our farmers to our ingredients, to our packaging, we are intentional in making sure sustainability and ethics lie at the core of what we do.

It’s not just a chocolate bar; it’s the cleanest on the planet—truly sustainable, ethically sourced, and incredibly indulgent. settings.title: What makes The Conscious Bar healthier than other chocolate?
settings.content: We consciously created bean-to-bar chocolate using two superfoods – Organic Cacao & Organic Dates. We intentionally wanted to use a sweetener that is rich both in taste and nutrients to create a memorable, and guilt free experience.

settings.title: What does Indulge Freely mean exactly?
settings.content: If you’ve had one of our bars, you’ve noticed the words “Indulge Freely” molded into each chocolate square. We believe that these two words embody the essence of why The Conscious Bar was created to begin with. We wanted to create a delicious guilt free chocolate bar that would stand the tests of flavor, ethics & environmental responsibility. Rest assure that you can indeed Indulge Freely when biting into one of our bar.

settings.title: What are the Health Benefits of Dark Chocolate?
settings.content: We use premium organic ingredients in all the bars to bring forth rich, unmatched flavor. All The Conscious Bars have a minimum of 72% cacao solids. In many studies, the consumption of dark chocolate has been shown to lower blood pressure. Dark chocolate is rich in antioxidants (specifically cocoa polyphenols), which can help to combat free radicals - destructive molecules that are implicated in heart disease and other ailments.

settings.title: Why do we use organic dates to sweeten our bars?
settings.content: We decided to sweeten our chocolate bars with organic dates not only because of it’s rich and delicious flavor, but also because of its magnificent nutritional value. Dates are stacked with fiber, antioxidants and minerals. Other benefits shown in studies claim that dates can contribute towards helping reduce inflammation, act as an energy booster & promote heart and brain health.
